packagegui.name: iperfserver
packagegui.title: Diagnostics/iperf

field.description:
Enter the port that iperf will bind to listen for client connections. (Default is 5201.)
iperf3 binds to TCP by default, but if the client requests UDP, it will bind to the same port on UDP as well during the test.
Choose to display output in bits/sec or bytes/sec. (Default is bits.)
Enter the desired interval between bandwidth, jitter and loss reports here. (Default is 0 for no periodic reports.)
iperf3 automatically sets most parameters dynamically based upon what clients request. Previously available server options are no longer necessary.
